 2002-17882002-10-240LAB,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY AND HEALTH REGULATIONS to the extent that employers will be required to provide a worker who works from or on a vehicle at a height of 2.4 metres above the nearest permanent safe level with a fall-protection system (section 12.10), where it is reasonably practical to do so.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2002-0379 Publication Date: 2002-11-06
Attachments
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADA OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY AND HEALTH REGULATIONS to the extent that employers will be required to provide a worker who works from or on a vehicle at a height of 2.4 metres above the nearest permanent safe level with a fall-protection system (section 12.10), where it is reasonably practical to do so.
